short_summary: Reçu dicette consultation en 5 pièces, intermediaire (niveau 2)
description: Cette consultation est un appel d'offres seulement pour les fournisseurs prégelés, ce qui est la suivante :
full_summary:
### One (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006949
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-12
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-07T14:00:00

**Request for Proposal:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is to use the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply. The RFP is open to pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS Method of Supply with Tier 1 classification in the category 5.16: Life Cycle Management Specialist. 

**Services Required:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of One (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist to provide support to the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Business Management (DAEBM) 2. The services required include:

* Level of Effort: 240 days per resource per year
* Location of Work: National Capital Region, 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC
* Security Clearance: FSC - Secret

**Bidder Requirements:**
Prequalified bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Department of National Defence via email. The RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

**Important Dates:**
The tender closing date has been extended to October 7, 2022 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).

**Pre-qualified Suppliers:**
Pre-qualified suppliers can be found under the TSPS Method of Supply. For information on how to become pre-qualified, please contact Public Works and Government Services Canada at `spts.tsps@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
Sharon Sally
DND Point of Contact
Email: `DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca`
Phone: 819-939-8990

**Trade Agreements:**
This bid is open to suppliers who have a valid agreement under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free
